property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may choose a spell from among them that costs 6 or less and cast it for no cost. Put the rest into your graveyard. {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, this creature breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your shields face down, and put the rest into your hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {DORON GO} Cosmo:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Cosmo" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Cosmo" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, you may draw a card or choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {DORON GO} Alchemy:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Alchemy" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Alchemy" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures. If you do, your opponent reveals cards from the top of their deck until he reveals a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone. Then, your opponent shuffles their deck. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If one of your opponent's creatures attacks you and isn't blocked, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard and destroy that creature. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks for the first time each turn, untap this creature. {SHIELD GO} (When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead.) ■ While this creature is face up in your shield zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then return up to 2 creatures from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 5 or more creatures in the battle zone, this turn, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +5000 power and can't be blocked by creatures that have power 5000 or less and break an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may draw up to 3 cards. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {CENTER GOD LINK} (As you put this creature or another God into the battle zone, you may unlink any number of your Gods. Then you may link this creature to a God that has "Right God Link" and/or "Left God Link".) ■ If this creature is linked as 3 cards, your shields can't break.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may draw up to 3 cards. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {CENTER GOD LINK} (As you put this creature or another God into the battle zone, you may unlink any number of your Gods. Then you may link this creature to a God that has "Right God Link" and/or "Left God Link".) ■ If this creature is linked as 3 cards, your shields can't break.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may draw up to 3 cards. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {CENTER GOD LINK} (As you put this creature or another God into the battle zone, you may unlink any number of your Gods. Then you may link this creature to a God that has "Right God Link" and/or "Left God Link".) ■ If this creature is linked as 3 cards, your shields can't break.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, this creature can attack untapped creatures until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, break a shield. ■ Infinity Power Attacker (While attacking, this creature has infinite power.) {DORON GO} Kung Fu:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Kung Fu" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Kung Fu" in their name into the battle zone.
